turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file an insurance claim. I had a car accident last week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry to hear about your accident. I can help you with that. To get started, can you please provide your policy number and a brief description of what happened?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my policy number is ABC123XYZ. The other driver ran a red light and hit me. My car is pretty damaged. I've already filed a police report.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I have received your policy number and brief description. I am going to pre-fill the claim form with the details you have provided. Please upload the police report and any photos of the damage, if you have them.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I've uploaded the police report and photos. But... I'm getting a little confused. The form asks about 'estimated repair costs' but I haven't had the car looked at yet. What do I put there?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question. For the 'estimated repair costs', it's okay to leave it blank for now. Once your car is assessed by our approved mechanic, we can update the form with the final quote. Also, it looks like your policy covers rental car, so you are eligible to file a rental car reimbursement claim. Do you want me to start one for you as well?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Wow, thank you, that's helpful! Yes, please do. I'm really glad that's covered, because I need a car to get to work. But now I am wondering - What if the other driver is uninsured? Does my policy cover that situation?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, your policy does include uninsured motorist coverage. If the other driver is uninsured, your policy would cover the damages. Once you provide the other driver's insurance information (if available), we can confirm this. We will handle the claim and keep you updated. We will assign a claims adjuster and you will be notified within 24 hours. Is there anything else I can help you with?
